tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: She has been an incredible source of support and guidance throughout my pregnancy journey and during the delivery of my baby. Her expertise, care, and compassion made all the difference. I am deeply grateful for everything she has done for me and my baby. Thank you ma'am from the bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a great experience with dr Mamtha . My pregnancy got confirmed in front of her only while we visited just for routine checkup. Throughout the pregnancy, she was so supportive and kind. She explained everything so nicely that our 9 month journey passed without any hiccups. On my delivery day, we went to the hospital in evening, she came and encouraged me for normal delivery as I was only 2 cm dilated , then after about 3 hours she came back( though everyone was expecting delivery in morning only) as I was dilated to 6 cm and delivered happened around midnight. Trust me i gave up on normal delivery but it was only doctor who made it possible, it was normal with forceps as I was really tired with so much pain. Doctor was there at night till I got shifted to my room and handed over to my husband . She explained everything to him as our child got hurt a bit on head due to forceps but with god grace everything was good and it was only superficial scar. We are very happy to have her as our doctor as she handled the situation brilliantly and did what was necessary. Now after a month me and my son both are healthy and happy. Thanku so much doctor for taking care of me and my child *** ***** ** ******* ** **** *** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We went to Dr. Mamtha for my first pregnancy scans and check ups. The services that I receive from her is excellent. Dr. Mamtha is very straight forward, she don't suggest any unwanted medicines until it's very much required for you. And she ensure that I am properly informed about my health and care. We have visited her in Suraksha hospital for my first pregnancy. She is very practical, calm and friendly. She always listens to our query very patiently and given good suggestions. She explained everything to me in a very clear manner. She has made our pregnancy journey very smooth. She used to explain upcoming test and scans required for me. On the day of my delivery my water broke all of sudden at 37th week, I called her she asked me not to panic and reach hospital asap as I was soo scared. After check up I was given medicine to increase my pain. During delivery my baby's pulse was not fine she encouraged me to push and it was only because of her I was able to deliver baby naturally (forceps assisted). Big thanks to Dr. Mamtha. *** ** *** **** ** *** *******
I would highly recommend her to everyone without a single doubt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had a bad experience in this clinic. The Doctor and the receptionist/lab person *** ****** ******* **** ********** *** very rude. We visited during the trimester, and we went through internal scanning and blood test which costed 7000. The lab person there is terrible, *** *** ****** **** ** ***** ***** ***************** they mentioned they will inform us how the test result is. But we did not get any call from them and the even to get the wrong result they delayed it further 2 more days. Even the blood group they gave is AB ve when I am O ve. We realised it wrong after a month and once we informed them, they were least bothered and said that lab technician will be available only after 3 days and they don’t care or took responsibility of there mistake. I had to call several times to get in touch with the Doctor and she responded with a very harsh attitude and never initiated to call us back and say sorry or gave the money back. They have no concern for the patients and not worried or least bothered about the complaints.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A lot we owe to !! A lot we want to thank you for !! A lot to appreciate about !! My wife truly feel blessed to have Dr. Mamatha Reddy as our gynecologist doctor, as mentor, as friend and supportive system. We are visiting Dr. Mamatha since 2018. Here is our experience and story with Doctor.It was my wife's first pregnancy; Me and my wife visited Dr. Mamatha for first time during 7th week of pregnancy. Unfortunately pregnancy got terminated as miscarriage. Dr. Mamatha has been very great mentor since to my wife and explained us about such losses not to be blamed ourselves. With Dr. advices and positive talks helped us to overcome this loss.In Oct 2019, My wife was again carrying and we started our routine check ups with Dr. Mamatha Reddy with all new joyful attitude.  With all excellent care and treatment throughout pregnancy, on 23rd June 2020 we blessed with baby boy as normal delivery though my wife experienced complications in 7th month and having miscarriage in past. Mamatha ma'am have wonderful skilled hands. Thank you for being dedicated, thoughtful and compassionate doctor that you are! You always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. Dr. Mamatha Reddy is 'Hero' in our family. Thank you again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We have been consulting doctor Mamatha at Femiint Whitefield since April 2019 for our pregnancy. Consulted multiple doctors earlier and we are absolutely glad/feel blessed that we found Mamatha mam for her positivity and she made sure that we progress through our pregnancy smoothly till delivery. We were new to everything in this area as we had just shifted and we chose Femiint as the clinic is nearby for us and the doctor based on her reviews. We totally didn't have much clues about the doctor at the beginning but she proved with her way of communication and approach during every visit that she is simply awesome..!! Her straight forward, positive approach and guidance is highly appreciated and very professional. She has always been patient enough to clarify/answer all the doubts and questions we had everytime. Have recommended her to my friends. We are now blessed with a beautiful and healthy baby girl through normal delivery as she planned and consulting her for post delivery guidance as well. Thanks a ton Mamatha mam..!! :)

tags: Wait time,
review:
I don't have enough words to express how grateful I am, I want to express my gratitude to Dr. Mamtha, this  feedback is to commend and praise her kindness and overall compassion. I am so lucky to have been in under her care.
She helped me to overcome through some difficult days of my pregnancy. I have never been in situation of normal delivery, it was only and only her who believed that it is possible and yes we did it. 
We have been blessed with healthy baby girl on 30th July 2019. The full joruney of my pregnancy I was able to pass *happily* is because of her, I have faced issue of broken placenta, tangeled cord around baby neck, baby's tricky movements and my mood swings but she was the one who kept me high in each situation. I kept on saying for C-sec but she was very positive that we will try for normal and here I am.
I have lot n lot to say about her an endless praising for her. She is very precise and lovingly Dr. In each and every way,
I would always suggest for any kind of Gynec consultation to visit Dr. Mamtha.

She is and will always be the best for me....
Thank you soo much Dr. Mamtha...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have consulted Dr. Mamatha Reddy during my wive's pregnancy soon after it was confirmed(this was our first delivery). The way Dr.Mamatha gives support and care is really appreciatble. During our first visit we had so many doubts about pregnancy but once we started talking to her we felt so comfortable, she is very patient enough to explain all our doubts(some times she explained in telugu as well which is our mother tongue). Even though we consulted her for 5 months (later we went to our home town for delivery)we got so much of confidence from her. she will clear all your doubts before you step out of her room. By god's grace we are blessed with a baby boy. We are really Thankfull to you Madam for every thing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi
I have been consulting with doctor Mamatha during my pregnancy journey.
*** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** *******from the beginning she was very patience in explaining things to me and clearing all my doubts. She never panics patients, she talks with such a confidence even if we have any issue we feel like it may get cured.

I had less water level, but though she gave a try for normal delivery....she induced pain for labour and waited along with me for more than 18 hours....she visited hospital very frequently to check how was I doing and did cervix got opened or not. Night she stayed in the hospital and making visit during midnight's.

Finally, due to some issue - she had to do ke c-section, she handled with very care and I was blessed with an baby girl.

Trust me ther are still some doctors who try for normal delivery as well...Dr Mamatha is one among them.

I would highly recommend everyone to visit her during pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm happy to write this review!Dr. Mamata Reddy is highly recommended doctor for pregnancy checkup. Also femiint fertility centre recommended as their facilities are really good as compared to other hospitals. The doctor always available for any sort of medical advice. She always make sure her patient is cared enough and leaves with no doubts after the consultation. And recently I have realised that the doctor never scared me though I had few medical issues. She chooses the right way of approach to put it across hence the patient feels comfortable. And the medical procedure in femiint hospital is really well organised and confidential.Unfortunately, I have to leave Bangalore and continue my pregnancy checkup in my hometown during my 7th month of pregnancy. Thank you so much doctor for your kind support and guidance!

tags: Wait time,
review: Hate it when they take appointment and still make a patient wait for more than an hour.  Seriously?? Then why take an appointment..isn't our time valuable..  I understand if there is a delay of upto 30minutes considering the time with the doctor varies with each patient but waiting more than an hour is not acceptable..please organise yourself and then give appointment else let it be walk in.. I think that would move faster.. will never ever visit again.. updating the review.. after a wait for an hour.. when I go enquire about my appointment I get to know then that Doc has gone for emergency.. i understand when an emergency comes she needs to attend.. but what are the concerned people doing.. they didn't even bother to inform about the status and they just made me wait.. seriously heights of irresponsibility..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Ultimate doctor...I have no words to say!!Starting from the day we consulted this doctor till we received our baby, the kind of encouragement, caring, confidence, explanation of the issue, response on time etc., given by the doctor is excellent and unbelievable. There was a known complexity for my wife throughout the pregnancy, but every time we talk to the doctor, it boosts with positive energy. As per all scannings, our expected baby weight was more and we all are prepared for C-Section as we know my wife's condition is not good due to many consequences.Finally the day has come and from the moment we admitted my wife in the hospital, the doctor was on time and she was assisting my wife with so much encouragement. My wife delivered baby with with the unexpected weight of 4.7kgs and that to it was a normal delivery!!! at that moment, we felt she has done some magic :). We all are extremely satisfied with Dr.Mamatha throughout 270 days, we have never seen such a down to earth, so simple... doctor in my life. From my heart, our experience with the doctor was so memorable and we all from our family strongly recommends her!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would like to keep the purpose of my visit private. The doctor was good and experienced (atleast as per practo). She helped me out with the respective treatment except, She was bland considering how all gynae problems should be seen a bit personally/emotionally. It was my first ever visit to a gyno and my level of consciousness was long forgotten seeing the poor/unorganised condition of the hospital. Most importantly, the appointment I scheduled through practo was cancelled, As the receptionist informed they had closed online appointments...I had to take a fresh appointment and wait for about over an hour. The receptionist took forever. She was so lost that she had forgotten I paid the amount I had to. Instead, she asked me to stay back insisting the same is pending. While I was forced to put down my foot and plainly mention " I am leaving"  although I didnt intend to be rude. I had the receipt she printed out for me. Special mentions to the toilet which was in no way to be considered a toilet fit for a multi speciality hospital where, hygiene is primary. I had to demand for the toilet paper and explain it's a mandate in a hospital while the nurse told me " Sorry madam, we have no tissues." which left me astound. I have a photograph of the toilet if I have to attach it. I believe this hospital and its services are over rated on practo and they should re consider the ratings.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Mamatha was very explanatory and gives good suggestions 100 percent, excellent in taking care of the concern....But  Suraksha Hospital, Varthur Authorities I want to bring to your notice one thing....I visited the lab on 13 Oct 2018 morning 8 A.M to take tests as suggested by the same hospital doctor Mamatha but the lady lab technician who is on duty is continuously attending calls from her friends/family and she is not concentrating on her work, she is still talking on her personal mobile even while dumping taken blood from disposal van sirenge to test tube, while talking she is taking so much time to fill test tube, and after that she is not writing the patient name on the test tube and asking us to leave when we asked her to write my name she wrote only first name even after asking several times she wrote full name on only one test tube and remaining 2 she wrote only first name busy in talking on her phone and was saying so arrogantly like nothing will happen, I am sure if some other patient comes with same first name she will mess up the reports,  after all they are charging money for the tests she is not doing social service hear,I hope hospital is paying salary. I request you to take strict action against her by my experience I don't suggest people to take tests in this hospital. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I wanted thank  Dr.Mamatha for her caring during my wife Pregnancy. I am happy to Give 5STAR..and even 5+1Star…..

I would suggest those who are reading this review please consult Dr.Mamatha..she is very good doctor and if your struggling to have Baby she is the right person to guide you in right way. I recommended most of my friend to go visit..Dr.Mamatha

Just wanted to let you all know that My self and my wife married in 2014 and we are trying for Baby for long time and didn’t succeed due to PCOD issue which my wife had… we have consulted many doctor and we have failed to hear good news and non-of the doctor suggested or treated in right way… And finally we met Dr.Mamatha Madam in the year of 2016 and we have explained our problem and we told our problem and trying for Baby and didn’t succeed yet. Then she explained what needs to be done, she gave hope and in the first time itself we had confident on her and then we had hope that we can have Baby And she had suggested some test which we wife need to undergone she never asked to test unnecessary test which other doctors normally does, she always helped us to save money. Me and my wife very thank full to her… 
And finally we heard good new on 26-12-2017 my wife got conceived and its “”TWINS””  and my wife Delivered two lovely Babies BOY & GIRL on 06-Sep-2018.


Once again I thank Dr.Mamatha my God bless your and your family….

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Check Up,Ovarian Cyst Removal,
review: Dr. Mamatha Reddy is one of the most professional physicians I have met. She's really good at finding the right cause of the problem/catches the right way to find what is causing the problem, and asks the right questions, and is genuinely concerned about her patients well being. I did not had to wait much long when I visited the Suraksha Hospital to see Dr. Mamatha Reddy. The receptionists were friendly and navigated me with the formalities with a good attitude. I went there for normal pregnancy checkup & some personal issues. And got a prescription for couple of tests which are being done at a different location. I am very pleased with my choice to have Dr. Mamatha Reddy as my primary physician. Will be waiting to visit this doctor again with the recommended medical test reports but not at this location. The hospital is not clean and there were street dogs roaming inside the hospital, despite parking issues we had to pass, we got to see unclean premises with some group of men sitting in the visitor bay (which is opposite to doctors room) and teasing nurses with nick names. ETC...etc...etc. I would strongly recommend this doctor but not in this Hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have no words to describe about the doctor she is excellent Dr . For me I really want to mention not less than god . She treats u like a family member. Suggest always dadi Nani nushkha no gives you extra medicine. And vey economical.... love you a lot Dr Mamta I have baby girl only because of u ....god bless always thanku for everything 💕😘

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have met this doctor several times and have noticed that Dr is dealing only with the equipments *** ****** ** ******* ** ***** ** *** **** ***** ** ************ We could sence that and we confirm it after meeting another infertility doctor for second opinion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have consulted her for my second pregnancy. I was referred by my friend and trust me she is very good doctor. She helped me in my full 9 month pregnancy and given solutions to all my queries. She is very trained in her field and know how to deal with all kind of situations. Me and my husband both are very happy with her treatment and in her guidance we are blessed with sweet little baby girl.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is really good *** **** ******* *********** ****** She doesn’t scare you with negative words like other doctors do. Very practical and to the point. It was my first pregnancy and with her guidance I delivered a healthy child. She always has a smile on her face. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: **** ****** ** **** **** took care of me and baby from the date of conception till delivery. She guided rightly with the treatment and was there giving us the courage when ever things got complicated. Never expected her to be in the hospital early morning when i complained about bleeding during induction. Femiint hospital nurses  and staffs were also good giving the care and attention , thank you all....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ****** * ** ***** ** *** ** * **** ********. we met in and surrounding Whitefield 
She is very friendly wid patients and gives times fo us to explain and listen wid patience to our quiry 
Her personality defines soft attitude towards her patients 
I have a great experience so far 
Thanks from d bottom of my heart to Dr Mamtha madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr mamatha is the only one i trust for my rainbow babies when i had an acute case of pcod when the other gynaecologists had no hope in me she had all the courage and trust in me to help me in natural conception with minimal amount of medications or invasive procedures  she guided me really very well every step and i still keep all her tips in handy i rely only on dr mamatha for my health related advise and consultation she is a very friendly doctor and interacts well with the patients and is a very positive personality

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** **** ******* we have experienced during my wife first pregnancy... Because of her only,we have got healthy child.I remember the time when my first baby born..She was there for entire time span, right from the good news till the baby born.There was some tough time too,but every time we consulted her,we came out with positive response.The kindness, friendliness and the positive smile on her face.. will cured the pain, tension too.A lots of thanks to ma'am... for all  really love u ma'am, with great respect

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The hospital started appointments since 9am . I booked my appointment at 10:20am since all appointments were prebooked. The doctor herself visited late post 10am to the hospital which made the entire wait time to shift by more than 1hour. I reached at sharpe 10:20 but had to wait until 11:45am!! I think doctor should value and respect patients time and patience. She should reach on time which can save her as well as her patients time.

Or else hospital should simply stop this appointment concept at the first place, first come first serve should help everybody

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself Vikram , got married 2016 May,  we were tried for baby since 2016 , basically i am from Tamilnadu ,i have visited so many hospitals in tamilnadu and bangalore. Where ever i go they given same kind of tablet which has not working out. Finally i visited Femit whitefiled Branch and luckily we got Dr. Mamatha Reddy's appointment . She is the only doctor found the exact issue and explain where we lacked off and what kind of process needs to maintain for become pregnancy, you will not believe it , the first month of treatment itself we got a result. My is pregnant now , we are so happy and so thank full to Dr.Mamatha B Reddy. I strongly recommend who ever is looking for baby please visit Dr.Mamatha B Reddy, She is very Worth and very Friendly. ! 100% you will get a good result.Thank You So much Dr.Mamatha B Reddy to make us happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Mamatha she is awesome. She helps me alot to understand. The way she explains we can understand properly. I would recommend her to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It's really good for treatment & heartly treat for claint is reciving its worth off money thanks for femint

tags: None

review: The doctor was not available in the hospital.. we waited for more than an hour but she didn't turn up. her cell phone was switched off as well. we had booked this appointment one day ago, highly unprofessional on her end to not show up; or atleast inform patients who have taken prior appointment.

review: Doctor is very friendly & helpful. She did listen to us first with utmost patience & then she explained the whole process thoroughly to us. Only relevant tests she asked us to do & never asked to go for unnecessary tests. I would recommend to the couple who are into family planning & looking for good advices.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
With the great care and support from Dr.Mamatha B Reddy mam, we are blessed with baby girl. My wife had 2 miss carry and one Ectopic.  Since, we had 3 miss carry history, Dr.Mamatha mam took great care of my wife from Day 1 in this pregnancy. and result is, my wife has delivered healthy, active baby girl with Normal Delivery. Both Mom and Baby is doing good.

I recommend Dr. Mamatha B Reddy to everyone. *** ** *** **** *******
